Package opendap.olfs

This package contains the core code for the OPeNDAP Server-4 servlet, ommonly refered to as the OPeNDAP Lightweight Front-end Server (OLFS).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BesAPI BES transaction code and client pool management are contained in this class.
BESConfig Holds a configuarrtion for the BES.
BESCrawlableDataset This implmentation of the THREDDS CrawlableDataset interface provides the connection between the core THREDDS functionalities and the BES.
ConditionalGetHandler Deprecated.  
DevNull A stream that acts like /dev/null - it just throws it all away!
FileServlet Servers regular files from the BES - used in conjunction with the OPeNDAP directry response.
HeaderInputStream The HeaderInputStream filters the input to only read lines of text until the "Data:" line.
HttpDispatchHandler Handler fo HTTP GET requests.
OLFSConfig This class holds configuration information for the OLFS.
S4Dir Handler for OPeNDAP directory requests.
SoapDispatchHandler Handler for SOAP requests.
Version Contains the Version and UUID information fr Server4.
 

Exception Summary
BadConfigurationException  
BESException Thrown when something BAD happens in the BES - primairly used to wrap BES errors in a way that the servlet can manage.
 

Package opendap.olfs Description

This package contains the core code for the OPeNDAP Server-4 servlet, ommonly refered to as the OPeNDAP Lightweight Front-end Server (OLFS). This server acts as a portal to all of OPeNDAP Back End Server (BES) implmentations and is designed to unify server behaviour for various OPeNDAP servers. The OLFS class contains all of the logic for decoding a client request and then making the appropriate response.
